Table sys_user

Card of the table sys_user

Name

sys_user

Code

sys_user

Constraint name of table sys_user

TK_sys_user


Server check expression of table sys_user

%RULES%


Code preview of sys_user

drop table if exists sys_user;

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: sys_user */
/*==============================================================*/
create table sys_user
(
user_id bigint not null auto_increment comment '用户ID',
user_name varchar(20) comment '用户名',
account varchar(30) comment '登陆帐户',
password varchar(50) comment '密码',
mobile varchar(50) comment '手机号',
email varchar(50) comment '邮箱',
sex tinyint comment '性别(0:未知;1:男;2:女)',
dept_id bigint comment '部门ID',
locked bit default 0 comment '锁定标志(1:锁定;0:激活)',
remark varchar(100) comment '备注',
user_type tinyint comment '人员类型(1:业务人员;2:管理员;3:系统内置人员;)',
enabled bit default 0 comment '启用状态(1:起用;0:不启用)',
create_time timestamp comment '创建时间',
create_user_id bigint comment '创建人ID',
primary key (user_id)
);

alter table sys_user comment '用户';
